QuestData.Title: Rebuilding the Staff
QuestData.Description: <Ravandwyr inspects the staff, noting that part of the headpiece seems to be missing.>$B$BSimply barbaric! Ekkorash must've taken the staff's crystalline headpiece for use in some other trinket, not realizing that it works in concert with the rest of the staff.$B$BAs long as it remains broken, the staff's power is greatly diminished. With a suitable draenei crystal, I should be able to repair it. I've heard the goblins remarking about the crystals carried by the ghosts at the Enkaat Ruins to the north.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 4 Flawless Crystal Shards from the ghosts at the Enkaat Ruins and return them to Ravandwyr at Area 52.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you managed to find some suitable crystals for a new headpiece for the archmage's staff?
QuestData.RewardText: <Ravandwyr carefully examines the crystals, then selects one.>$B$BThis crystal should work. I'll reshape the stave's socket to secure the new headpiece.$B$BWhen Archmage Vargoth sees it, he will be disappointed, but I can bear my master's disappointment if it means we've freed him.
